analysis.Summary: Vue component that renders the application header with logo, menu toggle, location selector, search/shopcart/profile controls and language switcher, driven by global state and route metadata.
analysis.Purpose: Provides the top navigation bar across the site, handling layout, theme styling, user interactions (sidebar toggle, location popup, cart toggle), and routing for search and profile features.

Components.name: NotificationBadge
Components.responsibility: Displays a notification count/icon for authenticated users.

Components.name: Button
Components.responsibility: Reusable button component used for menu, search, cart, profile actions.

Components.name: Select
Components.responsibility: Dropdown selector used for language switching.

Components.name: Checkbox
Components.responsibility: Imported but not used in this component.

Components.name: logotype
Components.responsibility: Dynamic component prop for the site logo, clickable to navigate home.

Functions.name: openLocationPopup
Functions.description: Sets the global flag to open the location selection popup.

Functions.name: onMounted callback
Functions.description: Called when the component mounts; initializes the shopping cart state via shopcart.actions.setShopcart().

analysis.Usage: Imported into main layout or page components to display the global header. In code: import Header from 'modules/globals/views/components/partials/Header.vue'; used in templates as <Header :theme="..." :logotype="..."/>.
Notes: Dynamic theme classes ('light' vs 'dark') applied to text and borders.
Relies on global store state for sidebar, location popup, cart and auth information.
Slot is provided for injecting additional content in the center of the header.
Some imported utilities (computed, toRefs, ref, inject, Checkbox) are not used and could be cleaned up.
SCSS defines custom styles for the hamburger menu and navigation animations.
